content: Welcome back, lekhashree! Ask me about appointments, pet adoption events, post-visit care or chat for emotional support.

I can't book appointments directly for you, but I can guide you through the process. Please provide more details about the type of appointment you're looking to schedule, such as:

- The service you need (medical, beauty, consultation, etc.)
- The location or provider you'd like to visit
- Your preferred date and time

With that information, I can help you figure out how to set it up!
